title: Threat intelligence - TAXII
descriptionMarkdown: Microsoft Sentinel integrates with TAXII 2.0 and 2.1 data sources to enable monitoring, alerting, and hunting using your threat intelligence. Use this connector to send threat indicators from TAXII servers to Microsoft Sentinel. Threat indicators can include IP addresses, domains, URLs, and file hashes. For more information, see the [Microsoft Sentinel documentation >](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=2224105&wt.mc_id=sentinel_dataconnectordocs_content_cnl_csasci).

sampleQueries.query:
ThreatIntelligenceIndicator | where SourceSystem !in ("SecurityGraph", "Azure Sentinel", "Microsoft Sentinel") 
            and ExpirationDateTime > now() | join ( SigninLogs ) on $left.NetworkIP == $right.IPAddress | summarize count() by ThreatType

ThreatIntelligenceIndicator | where SourceSystem !in ("SecurityGraph", "Azure Sentinel", "Microsoft Sentinel") 
            and TimeGenerated >= ago(1d) | summarize count()

dataTypes.name: ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
ThreatIntelligenceIndicator | where SourceSystem !in ("SecurityGraph", "Azure Sentinel", "Microsoft Sentinel") 
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

customs.name: TAXII Server
customs.description: TAXII 2.0 or TAXII 2.1 Server URI and Collection ID.

instructionSteps.title: Configure TAXII servers to stream STIX 2.0 or 2.1 threat indicators to Microsoft Sentinel
instructionSteps.description:
You can connect your TAXII servers to Microsoft Sentinel using the built-in TAXII connector. For detailed configuration instructions, see the [full documentation](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/import-threat-intelligence#adding-threat-indicators-to-azure-sentinel-with-the-threat-intelligence---taxii-data-connector). 

Enter the following information and select Add to configure your TAXII server.
